title: Sinusoidal Function - Maximum Value and Period

content.description: The function <math alttext="H"><mi>H</mi></math> models a periodic phenomenon. The maximum value of <math alttext="H"><mi>H</mi></math> is <math alttext="8"> <mn>8</mn> </math>, which occurs at time <math alttext="t equals 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> hours. The period of <math alttext="H"><mi>H</mi></math> is <math alttext="12"> <mn>12</mn> </math> hours.
content.question: For <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 24"> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>24</mn> </math> hours, which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="H open parentheses t close parentheses"> <mi>H</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3.5 sin open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 4.5"><mn>3.5</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn></math>

<math alttext="3.5 sin open parentheses pi over 6 t close parentheses plus 4.5"><mn>3.5</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn></math>

<math alttext="3.5 cos open parentheses pi over 12 t close parentheses plus 4.5"><mn>3.5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn></math>

<math alttext="3.5 cos open parentheses pi over 6 t close parentheses plus 4.5"><mn>3.5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3.5 cos open parentheses pi over 6 t close parentheses plus 4.5"><mn>3.5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn></math>

topic.text: 3.7: Sinusoidal Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
